ThingDef.label: Ming Snake (Friendly)
ThingDef.description:
There is a chance to appear in the colony one year after the colony is established. According to the legend of Shenzhou, this kind of beast has a snake-like body and a pair of wings. 

According to the design of the myth, the genetic engineering project of the Celestial Soldiers has bred the fringe snake to help them destroy the fringe world. 

Obviously, such a plague snake will bring drought when it comes, although it will not actively attack the colonists, if left alone, the colony's crops will gradually wither. 

When fighting at a distance, Snakes use a large-scale sonic attack that dazzles all affected colonists. In close combat, it will use its sharp fangs to bite the enemy. Such fangs are very deadly. What's more, it will release the wind shield every once in a while, and the wind shield will bounce back all the enemies from outside the wind shield The long-range attack of the wind shield, and the enemy in the wind shield will continue to receive cutting damage.
